entry.title: 하스스톤 앨범 앱2
entry.content:
• Splash 화면
  • 앱바 없애기
  • 테두리 둥글게
  • Margin,Padding
  • Intent putExtra

Splash 화면

  1. Splash Activiy를 만든다
  2. AndroidManifest 파일에서 < intent-filter > … </ intent-filter >를 Splash 엑티비티 아래에 위치 하게 한다
  3. activity_splash.xml 파일에 사진을 넣는다
  4. splash Activiy에서 Handler()을 이용해 메인 액티비티로 화면을 넘기다
// AndroidManifest.xml
<activity
    android:name=".SplashActivity"
    android:exported="true">
        <intent-filter>
            <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
            <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> 
        </intent-filter>
</activity>

// activity_splash.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".SplashActivity">

    <ImageView
        android:src="@drawable/splash"
        android:scaleType="fitCenter"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"/>

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

// SplashActivity
import android.content.Intent
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import android.os.Bundle
import android.os.Handler

class SplashActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_splash)

        Handler().postDelayed({
            startActivity(Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java))
            finish()
        },2000)

    }
}

앱바 없애기

  1. theme.xml파일에서 < item name=”windowNoTitle” >true</ item >을 추가한다
<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
    <!-- Base application theme. -->
    <style name="Theme.HearthStone_album2" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar">
        <!-- Primary brand color. -->
        <item name="windowNoTitle">true</item> // 이 부분이다
        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_500</item>
        <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item>
        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item>
        <!-- Secondary brand color. -->
        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item>
        <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item>
        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item>
        <!-- Status bar color. -->
        <item name="android:statusBarColor" tools:targetApi="l">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item>
        <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
    </style>
</resources>

테두리 둥글게

  1. 둥글게 하고 싶은 이미지뷰를 카드뷰로 감싸준다
  2. 카드뷰의 속성 app:cardCornerRadius로 둥근 정도를 정한다
// activity_main.xml
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_margin="10dp"
    app:cardCornerRadius="50dp"> // 둥근 정도 정하기

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/main_warrior_iv"
        android:layout_width="120dp"
        android:layout_height="120dp"
        android:scaleType="fitXY"
        android:src="@drawable/warrior" />

</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

Margin,Padding

padding: 뷰 안쪽
margin: 뷰 바깥쪽

// activity_splash.xml
<ImageView
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:layout_margin="20dp"
    android:background="@color/white"
    android:padding="20dp"
    android:scaleType="fitCenter"
    android:src="@drawable/splash" />

Intent putExtra

  1. 데이터를 주는 액티비티에서 putExtra()를 통해 데이터를 넘긴다
  2. 데이터를 받는 액티비티에서 getExtra()를 통해 데이터를 받는다
// MainActivity.kt
val warriorBtn = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_warrior_iv)
val shamanBtn = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_shaman_iv)

warriorBtn.setOnClickListener {

    val intent = Intent(this, ImageInsideActivity::class.java)
        intent.putExtra("data", "1")
        startActivity(intent)
    }

shamanBtn.setOnClickListener {

    val intent = Intent(this, ImageInsideActivity::class.java)
        intent.putExtra("data", "2")
        startActivity(intent)
    }

// ImageInsideActivity.kt
val getData = intent.getStringExtra("data")

val changeImage = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.inside_image_area_iv)

if(getData == "1"){
    changeImage.setImageResource(R.drawable.warrior)
}
if(getData == "2"){
   changeImage.setImageResource(R.drawable.shaman)
}
entry.summary: Splash 화면 앱바 없애기 테두리 둥글게 Margin,Padding Intent putExtra

entry.title: 하스스톤 앨범 앱1
entry.content:
• main 레이아웃
  • warrior 레이아웃
  • findViewById Toast Intent

main 레이아웃

// 메인 레이아웃
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical" // 레이아웃들을 수직으로 정렬 시킨다
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="120dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_warrior_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/warrior" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_shaman_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/shaman" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_rogue_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/rogue" />

    </LinearLayout>

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_paladin_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/paladin" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_hunter_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/hunter" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_druid_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/druid" />

    </LinearLayout>

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_warlock_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/warlock" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_mage_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/mage" />

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_priest_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/priest" />

    </LinearLayout>

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/main_demonhunter_iv"
            android:layout_width="120dp"
            android:layout_height="120dp"
            android:src="@drawable/demonhunter" />

    </LinearLayout>


</LinearLayout>

warrior 레이아웃

// 메인 화면에서 앨범 클릭시 보여주는 화면 중 하나
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".WarriorActivity">

    <ImageView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:src="@drawable/warrior" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

findViewById Toast Intent

import android.content.Intent
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import android.os.Bundle
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val warriorImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_warrior_iv) // 이미지 id를 통해 연결
        val shamanImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_shaman_iv)
        val rogueImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_rogue_iv)
        val paladinImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_paladin_iv)
        val hunterImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_hunter_iv)
        val druidImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_druid_iv)
        val warlockImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_warlock_iv)
        val mageImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_mage_iv)
        val priestImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_priest_iv)
        val demonhunterImg = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.main_demonhunter_iv)

        warriorImg.setOnClickListener { // 이미지 클릭시 행동
            Toast.makeText(this, "전사 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show() // 화면에 글을 잠시 띄워준다

            val intent = Intent(this, WarriorActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)  // 지정한 액티비티로 전환
        }

        shamanImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "주술사 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, ShamanActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        rogueImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "도적 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, RogueActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        paladinImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "성기사 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, PaladinActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        hunterImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "사냥꾼 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, HunterActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        druidImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "드루이드 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, DruidActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        warlockImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "흑마법사 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, WarlockActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        mageImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "마법사 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, MageActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        priestImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "사제 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, PriestActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        demonhunterImg.setOnClickListener {
            Toast.makeText(this, "악마사냥꾼 클릭 완료", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()

            val intent = Intent(this, DemonHunterActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

    }
}
entry.summary: main 레이아웃 warrior 레이아웃 findViewById Toast Intent
